column5: Love the “honey don’t be mad” texts. Like it’s own sub genre...but with pics is outstanding. Great post!
Very Nice..but fantasy correct? Doesn’t look like same girl at end of post. Or a hotel room.
This is gold! Awesome they got pics
In PA. Right now
Snowing now in Pa...right now.
Whats your fav go-to app for this? Kik? I want my wife to get into it.
Holy Christ.

Moscato & time.....

Let her know you enjoy it....but pace it out. 

....unless your one of the lucky ones who has video........the go for the gold!!
Those boots r great!!!!!
Wow she is very shapely...fantastic! Her date will be very pleased! Best wishes.
Jealous!!!  Wish i had one of those vids of my wife
He had them all...his camera..:almost everyday for like a year...it adds up.
Beyond awesome. Have heard all about my wife’s vids but never got my hands on one. Your a lucky dude!!!
I think this number isnt hard to achieve for a single girl who dates for 7 or 8 years before marriage. If you break it down.
Super jealous. My wife’s ex claims the several hundred tapes they made were “destroyed”.  Kills me to not see at least one.
Jealous
Jealous...there are many my wifes HS boyfriend made but the claim is they were “destroyed”....enjoy!!!!! Not all of us are so lucky.
Hows it going?
Gorgeous. Is this what is sometimes known as the “frog-tie”....?
Jealous
Keep laughing Brook
I blame the powers that be for allowing people that are that sick walk among us without help...
He was clinically insane...No matter how much I have suffered he didnt know what he was doing.

I was assaulted at 15 at the beach...surprise attack from behind from a madman with a lead pipe. War is horrible...but i just want to stress that when your at the beach in broad daylight...on the boardwalk and you get Hit like that...you have PTSD for life. I have never been to war and I have PTSD. God bless all fighting men and women and all who suffer.
Nice. Classic college naughtiness...love it ( or sounded like college...funny maybe i just imagined it was college ). Lol
Ya not asking for places n names just what other husbands did that worked
Love those body stockings

Its amazing. We have been together since 1996 and I just heard 2 new stories...its like a never ending well..I asked a specific question about how many guys had she been to hotels with before we met etc and that question uncovered 2 more that were off my radar. Its a balance though..knowing when to ask...and when to let it rest. I thoroughly enjoy my wifes slutty adventures and just hope to get more specifics...cheers!!
